Text:
4:3 aspect ratio, not 16:9 widescreen

I appreciate what you do MrUnpopular, but why is the rip 4:3?  I can't help but think with the way technology is today that you would have to go out of your way to NOT make it 16:9.
We just offer what we can. We haven't got Nick HD so we cap the regular Nickelodeon channel, which broadcasts this in 4:3.
Well that's a bullshit excuse. If you're going to 'offer what you can', make it the best possible. Stop settling for second-best.
This is the most we can offer lol
anychance you have the latest episode 11
